QuestData.Title: Brothers In Arms
QuestData.Description: Listen, $n. For the first time since the civil war I agree with Greymane. Now is the time to put aside our quarrel.$B$BIt sure doesn't look like these beasts care much whether you're a rebel or a royal.$B$BSend word back to Greymane. My men will join his.$B$BThere's a safehouse not far from here, in Josiah's cellar. My lads stashed some heavy artillery there.$B$BTell our king that my arsenals are now at his disposal.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to King Genn Greymane at the Military District in Gilneas City.
QuestData.RewardText: Rebel arsenals? In my own city?$B$BWhat in the bloody hell was Crowley up to?
